title: Karakter (1997)
description:
Title: Karakter

About "Karakter": Based on a book from Ferdinand Bordewijk, this Dutch drama set in the 1920s revolves around a son living with his mother that has to face his tyrannic father who constantly works against him. His dream is to become a lawyer and you see how he struggles through his life pursuing his goals with the constant dealing with his father.
